plot: Two strangers brought together by life, share their difficult experiences. They don't face adversity in the same way, but their encounter at this point in their lives will change one man's perspective forever.
title: Life Is a Gift
plot_es: Two strangers brought together by life, share their difficult experiences. They don't face adversity in the same way, but their encounter at this point in their lives will change one man's perspective forever.
plot_en: Two strangers brought together by life, share their difficult experiences. They don't face adversity in the same way, but their encounter at this point in their lives will change one man's perspective forever.
